description_bullets: Conducted research on Inquiry Based Learning. Improving students' and teachers performance by using (mobile, wearable and desktop based) technology.
Successful interdisciplinary collaborations in european projects (weSPOT, ECO, LA4S & Elite)
DojoIBL responsible: Platform to support Collaborative Inquiry Based Learning across devices.
Aread of contribution: Inquiry Based Learning methodology | Experimental Design | Software Engineer | DojoIBL | Data analysis | Strong analytical & communication skills | Learning Analytics
Smart Data Protection: Reducing legal burden for customers with a tailored solution.
Areas of contribution: PHP (Symfony2) | Github | Sonata Admin | Agile Development | Frontend & Backend
Actively developing and maintaining software for SMEs (Veterinary, Accounting and management, Lawyers college)
Responsible for software development of the Albeitar project: Personalised software for veterinary clinics management
Areas of contribution: Velneo | Design | Software Engineer | Agile Development | Communication skills | Customer advice
Responsible for the frontend in the EcoFamilias project.
EcoFamilias was a project to manage and save electric Asturian homes consuption.
Fuzzy logic to determine best savings in electric fees.
Technologies used: Java, MySQL, Javascript, HTML5, CSS3.
